notes: The Dictionary of Old English Corpus is a complete record of surviving Old English except for some variant manuscripts of individual texts. There are 3037 texts in the corpus, represented in two formats on the CD-ROM: Standard Generalized Markup Language (SGML) and Hyper Text Markup Language (HTML).
title: Dictionary of Old English Corpus in Electronic Form (DOEC)
